title: Start​
content: </> Rorooms:Start() → () Starts Rorooms.

title: Configure​
content: </> Rorooms:Configure(Config: Config) → () Reconciles Rorooms' config to your liking. Config type available here

title: Prompt​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> Rorooms:Prompt(Prompt: Prompt) → () Prompts the client, with support for callback buttons. Prompt type available here

title: Items 🔧​
content: Items are Tool objects, and go under Config.Items. Attribute	Type	OptionalItemId	string	❌ Tool	Tool	❌ DisplayName	string	✅ LevelRequirement	number	✅ GamepassRequirement	number	✅ Category	string	✅ Color	Color3	✅ LabelText	string	✅ LabelIcon	string	✅

title: Emotes 💃​
content: Emotes are Animation objects, and go under Config.Emotes. Attribute	Type	OptionalItemId	string	❌ Emoji	string	✅ AllowMovement	boolean	✅ DisplayName	string	✅ LevelRequirement	number	✅ GamepassRequirement	number	✅ Category	string	✅ Color	Color3	✅ LabelText	string	✅ LabelIcon	string	✅

title: Roles 🔳​
content: Roles are Configuration objects, and go under Config.Roles. Attribute	Type	OptionalRoleId	string	❌ Name	string	❌ Color	Color3	✅ LayoutOrder	number	✅ LevelRequirement	number	✅ GamepassRequirement	number	✅ Additionally, you can set a DefaultRoleId attribute onto Config.Roles itself to give a role to everyone by default.

title: Music 🎶​
content: Simply drop Sound instances into your Config.Music folder!

title: Disabling discovery​
content: You may not want to participate in Rorooms' worlds network, and that choice is supported. Understand that by doing this, your world will not receive support from any other worlds. Open the Config module  Type this in:  Additionally, you can set Enabled = false to disable the worlds menu entirely. Otherwise, you can still promote your own worlds by pasting their PlaceIds into FeaturedWorlds.

title: Roblox - Easy loader ✅​
content: Get the Rorooms Loader modelInsert it from the ToolboxPlace into ReplicatedStorageStart configuring!

title: Roblox - Custom 🔧​
content: Download the Rorooms.rbxm file listed hereInsert Rorooms.rbxm into ReplicatedStorageRequire ReplicatedStorage.RoroomsCall Rorooms:Start() from both the server and clientReference the API pages

title: Wally 🐶​
content: Copy the Wally detailsPaste it into your wally.toml dependenciesRun wally install

title: Goals 🎯​
content: Streamline the creation of social worlds ⚡Offer a superior experience for players ✨Uplift the social genre 📈

title: Features 📃​
content: 👤 Profiles - Change your nickname & bio🔧 Items - Access roleplay items💃 Emotes - Use emotes👥 Friends - Join & invite friends🌐 Worlds - Discover worlds⚙️ Settings - Mute music, hide UI, etc

title: Worlds Network 🌐​
content: Rorooms provides its own network of worlds, secured via peer-to-peer ranking based on received teleports. At scale, this creates a network effect, where worlds promote similar worlds, and the network is uplifted as a whole.

title: The Players 🙌​
content: Players always come first, and they appreciate a superior experience. By giving them these features, and allowing them to traverse worlds so seamlessly, they'll (theoretically) spend more time in social worlds as a whole.

title: Gamepasses 🔒​
content: To restrict certain features based on gamepass ownership, apply GamepassRequirement onto them. This works with items, emotes, locked zones, and locked doors. > See Easy Loader attributes 📄

title: Rorooms Plus ➕​
content: 📆 Rorooms Plus, a player-facing subscription is in consideration, likely to be implemented once Roblox releases third-party subscriptions.❤️ If Roblox supports affiliate earnings, you will earn a cut of Rorooms Plus revenue when sold from within your world. Roblox's support for this is not guaranteed.⚙️ As with everything in Rorooms, you will be able to configure or disable this feature.

title: 4. Publish! 🎉​
content: Disabling the worlds system

title: Animated Seats 🪑​
content: Seats that support custom sitting animations, and prompt-to-sit functionality. It's recommended to use this on all seat objects for a better user experience. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_AnimatedSeat ClassName	SeatAttribute	Type	OptionalRR_PromptToSit	boolean	✅ Children​ "Animation" - Animation

title: Animated Items 🔧​
content: Tools that support click-to-cycle animations. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_AnimatedItem ClassName	Tool Children​ Animations must be arranged in numerical order. "RR_ItemAnimations" - Folder "1" - Animation "2" - Animation "..." - Animation

title: Item Givers 🫴​
content: Prompt parts that give out items. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_ItemGiver ClassName	BasePartAttribute	Type	OptionalRR_ItemId	string	❌

title: Variant Cyclers 🔁​
content: Prompt parts that cycle between various models. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_VariantCycler ClassName	BasePart Children​ Variant models must be arranged in numerical order. "1" - Model"2" - Model"..." - Model

title: Locked Zones 🔒​
content: Locked zones are parts that prevent players from being within them based on certain criteria. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_LockedZone ClassName	BasePartAttribute	Type	OptionalLevelRequirement	number	✅ GamepassRequirement	number	✅

title: Locked Doors 🔒​
content: Locked doors are parts that prevent players from walking through them based on certain criteria. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_LockedDoor ClassName	BasePartAttribute	Type	OptionalLevelRequirement	number	✅ GamepassRequirement	number	✅

title: World Teleporters 🌐​
content: Parts that prompt teleports to other RoRooms worlds. Details Data	ValueTag	RR_WorldTeleporter ClassName	BasePartAttribute	Type	OptionalRR_PlaceId	number	❌
